#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long t,n,k,d,number, final_number,ans,re;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{cin>>n>>k;
	re=int(k/10);
		if(re==0)cout<<k<<endl;
		else {
			d=9;
			number=1;
			final_number=9;
			while(d<k)
			{   d+=(number+1)*9*(pow(10,number)) ;
			    final_number+=9*(pow(10,number));
				number++;
			}
			
			d-=(number)*9*pow(10,number-1);
			final_number-=9*(pow(10,number-1));
		//	cout<<d<<endl<<final_number<<endl;
			
			re = k-d;
		//	cout<<"r "<<re<<endl;
			final_number+=(re/number);
		//	cout<<"n "<<number<<endl;
			re=re%number;
			if(re==0){cout<<final_number%10<<endl;
		//	cout<<final_number<<endl;
		}
			else 
			{
			final_number++;
			re=number-re+1;
			while(re!=0)
			{ans=final_number%10;
			final_number/=10;
			re--;
			}
			cout<<ans<<endl;
		}
			
		}
	}



}
